data.title: Irish leader doesn’t regret calling Trump “racist and dangerous”

Anti-surveillance clothing aims to hide wearers from facial recognition | Hyperface project involves printing patterns on to clothing or textiles that computers interpret as a face, in fightback against intrusive technology
UK bosses will make more by midday Wednesday than workers earn all year.
China warns Donald Trump not to ‘Escalate’ North Korea situation with erratic tweets
Astronomers have found the source of a deep space radio wave burst for the first time
Dublin-based scientists have found the area of the brain linked to autism
The Indian government is set to endorse Universal Basic Income: The Indian government will release a report in January which says the idea is "feasible" and "basically the way forward".
A new law in France bans spanking of children, making it the 52nd country to prohibit the practice
Top Canada CEOs have already earned more than average worker's 2017 salary
IDF soldier who shot & killed immobile Palestinian assailant convicted of manslaughter
